name: Marble Craft Pop: the amazing slide puzzle game
name_original: Marble Craft Pop: the amazing slide puzzle game
description:
Marble Craft is a fun and addictive puzzle game, to play just move the marbles to connect 4 or more marbles of the same type, avoid the board getting full and keep an eye on the clock!

Features:
- Fun and addictive Gameplay
- Beautiful Retina Graphics
- Great Music and Sound Effects
- Lots of Levels to complete
- 3 Difficulty settings
- Close any time and resume later

A great time killer for puzzle lovers!

More info at www.boviosoft.com
